Applying for my first credit cards soon after getting first paycheck. Seems like a lot of options (cards with attractive sign-up bonus  general spending cards  specific category spending cards  etc.)...Will applying for these multiple cards at once negatively affect credit score or cause subsequent card applications to be rejected? Or should I space out the applications with a month or two in between?
Hi all  just to check if I hold a UOB PRIV MILES card  and apply thru the app for UOB lady solitaire is there likely a chance they will approve. Annual salary less than 120k
Or should I try the entry one and request upgrade few months later
Can apply the basic one then try to upgrade. There are a lot of people who managed to get even without 120k annual income.

No. You can check the travel MCCs eligible on their tnc.
